NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_TITLE: Welcome to the KU CSC MAP application
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: This application was build based on Ionic Super Starter app - a fully-featured Ionic starter with many pre-built pages and best practices.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: The purpose of this application is to aid university students navigate in and around the university campus, provide them useful information about the surroundings, university and university staff without the need of internet - offline
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_TITLE: How to use the KU CSC MAP
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION:
The 2 most important pages are the Map and Personnel page.

The Map pages shows you details about your current position in the campus. You can also see all the major university buildings and display details about them, such as their purpose, picture and floor information. You can use the lightweight navigation feature to track buildings. Searh buildings in the searchbar to quickly locate them.

On the Personnel page you can find out about teachers and other university staff.
WELCOME_INTRO: The starting point for your next great Ionic app
